conversion_verification.notes: The model represents a successful isometric 3D extrusions of the 2D layout.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Solid 3D geometry and perspective. Wall thickness and corner geometry are well-defined.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Major hallucination in the garage area (rendered as a bedroom/living space). Room count is largely accurate but functional identities are warped.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture represents logical items but scale is slightly inconsistent in smaller hallways.

visual_clarity.notes: High clarity and clean lighting; no UI artifacts present.

detected_errors.description: 2-Car Garage transformed into an interior living suite with a bed, ignoring structural intent of the plan.
The Study/Dining areas on the left have been merged or repurposed into separate bedrooms.

summary: While the 3D extrusion is technically excellent, the conversion suffered from significant semantic errors regarding room function, particularly in the garage area.
